channel.title: Bal Gosal
channel.description: Recent news about Bal Gosal, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Happy to hear 59,000 new jobs were created in Canada (44K in Ontario) last month. Jobs are priority one for our govt http://t.co/WdXeoN8pQZ

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great to hear John Herdman will remain with @CanadaSoccerEN through 2020. Great asset to Canadian Soccer http://t.co/800uo9QtvS

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Also good luck to @CyclingCanada's Louis Barbeau at the Paralympic Sport awards. Amazing cycling course at the London Paralympics!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Cool to see @CDNParalympics athletes recognized internationally. Congrats to Pat Anderson & the @WCBballCanada team! http://t.co/EjE66x7WQE

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Hey @MichelleRempel know any Calgary youth who'd like to try an Olympic sport? @LugeCanada is looking for athletes: http://t.co/R7VSKUO1Lh

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great work by our Men's National Basketball Team @CanBball advancing to the 2nd round at the FIBA Americas tourney! http://t.co/o9tw6xpog2
